CST2335_Final_Project OK CANCEL
//activity_house_settings_remote GARAGE HOUSE TEMPERATURE OUTSIDE WEATHER
//custom_dialog_add TEMPERATURE: TIME:
//garage_house_activity GARAGE SETTINGS Garage Door: OPEN CLOSE Garage Light
//house_temp_activity HOUSE TEMPERATURE Change Temperature Enter Temperature CHANGE TEMPERATURE ADD/DELETE SCHEDULE ADD
//weather_house_activity WEATHER FORECAST Ottawa, ONe
Author: Eric Pelley
 Version: 32
 Click one of the menu options to start
 Garage:
 Click OPEN to open the garage door. This will also light the garage light.
 Click Close to close the garage door. This will also turn off the garage light.
 Click on the garage lamp to activate the garage light
 Temperature of the house:
 Click the text box and write a value for the temperature, and then click CHANGE TEMPERATURE.
 Click the ADD button to add and remove the schedules you are making.
 Weather:
 Click on the Outdoor Weather Menu to view the weather outside.
 Thank you for using my program!
ABOUT AUTOMOBILE SETTINGS KITCHEN SETTINGS LIVING ROOM SETTINGS
